pr_title: CATROID-396 Start triple stitch with length 10

timeline.message: CATROID-396 Start triple stitch with length 10
CATROID-396 Start triple stitch with length 10

timeline.bodyText: @wslany since we updated version to ....96 for the last three stitch bricks, is this correct to increase by one here again?
timeline.author: DinosaurierRex

replies.bodyText: Yes, increasing it here again is fine. It is better to increase it without harm done than to forget. By increasing each time the xml changes, we don't have to think and check anymore whether it happened already, i.e., we follow the isolation principle. Could also be important if some things need to be retracted later.
replies.author: wslany
